enhanced_by.reason: The isValid method relies on the result of calculateModulus to determine the validity of the IBAN code.
The calculateModulus method uses Character.getNumericValue to process the IBAN code, which is indirectly related to the isValid method.
Both isValid and calculate methods deal with validating and calculating check digits for IBAN codes, making them useful for constructing assertions.
Both isValid and calculate methods handle CheckDigitException, making the exception message useful for assertions.
